div.p: SCOLYMUS, in botany: A genus of the polygamia aequalis order, belonging to the ſyngeneſia claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 49th order, Compositae. The receptacle is paleaceous; the calyx imbricated and prickly, without any pappus.
